Articles.Content:
Resource scanning and harvesting looks so cool, can't wait to start a new career mode game!

[http://www.charlestondailymail.com/apps/pbcsi.dll/storyimage/CH/20120604/DM01/306049985/EP/1/3/EP-306049985.jpg](http://www.charlestondailymail.com/apps/pbcsi.dll/storyimage/CH/20120604/DM01/306049985/EP/1/3/EP-306049985.jpg)

Moar coal!

> 
> Hmmm never changed for me? was and still ugly... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

There was a Kerbal over one of Kerbin's poles. I guess this means interesting stuff is happening on their end.
HYPE I'm back! Let's go for 300 pages!
It's not common to see people who are unable to wait for *Monday*. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I'm going to go to bed soon, I'll check by tomorrow and see how the hype train is doing.

HYPE ON!

> 
> [They adore the hypetrain.](http://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/33ys4s/we_are_the_team_behind_kerbal_space_program/cqps37h?context=3)

Why wouldn't they? We tried to order them pizza once... Actually this made my day.

Going to go dream of hype, hopefully I will wake to 1.0 being released!

> 
> **Next Mission Achieved: Total Internet Takeover**
> --Deploying listener scripts...
> 
> Holy cow, where did these last 60 pages come from?! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

Next step: Google homepage.

Less than 12 hours to release!!!!!! (Based off of KerbalX timer)

![tumblr_nmno699b141t5qaj2o2_500.gif](https://38.media.tumblr.com/a5e55495cab047f880f57e57afc0fd50/tumblr_nmno699b141t5qaj2o2_500.gif)

> 
> Next step: Google homepage.

Someone make a google doodle and contact them ***NOW***

> 
> Someone make a google doodle and contact them ***NOW***

We need to sneak in an undercover operative. Surely someone at Google's office plays KSP...

"Hey Scott. Whatcha doing over there? It looks like you're editing the homepage."

"NOTHING"

- - - Updated - - -

Aaaand the AMA is back under 5000 votes... to think I liked you, Reddit...

Less google, moar hype! Go go!

(also release in 57 minutes, or I sue~)

> 
> Less google, moar hype! Go go!
> (also release in 57 minutes, or I sue~)

Midnight at squad is in 1 hour and 57 minutes, they said Monday.

I am so ready to have Jeb,Bill,and Bob go on dates with the Female Kerbals! N-not that,you know there's anything wrong with that ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
Anyone else notice that some planet maybe Kerbin is starting to rise in the image on the [KSP web store](https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/). An hour ago there was no Kerbin in the image

If anyone wants to see the other comments by Max on the AMA, the best way (IMO) is to look at [/user/Maxmaps](http://www.reddit.com/user/Maxmaps) for the past few hours, some of the comments are quite funny, but not really newsworthy.
All I see is server maintainence.....

> 
> Midnight at squad is in 1 hour and 57 minutes, they said Monday.

It's midnight HERE in 49 minutes though~ Warmin' up the lawyers~

> 
> All I see is server maintainence.....

You don't see this?

![1duLEyc.png](http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png)
Why do you have a background picture? Mine is text-only.

> 
> I am so ready to have Jeb,Bill,and Bob go on dates with the Female Kerbals! N-not that,you know there's anything wrong with that ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Starships. Starships everywhere. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

1.0 will be in the download queue, but I think I'll hold off from starting a 1.0 game, at least until a few mods are confirmed updated or compatible. Or maybe it's time to start a stock-only Career game...

All i see is:

[h=1]Server Migration[/h]Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.

We appreciate your patience.

- Squad Team

> 
> Why do you have a background picture? Mine is text-only.

Yeah, mine too.

HE'S a SPECIAL ONE. Bring out the pitchforks and torches!
The background is on the site home page, not the store.

> 
> All i see is:
> [h=1]Server Migration[/h]Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.
> 
> We appreciate your patience.
> 
> - Squad Team

Try refreshing. I saw that a couple hours ago but it changed.
Still nothing, text only.
